        public static boolean send(java.lang.String subject,
                           java.lang.String body,
                           java.lang.String to,
                           java.io.InputStream[] attachments,
                           java.lang.String[] names,
                           java.lang.String[] contents)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Send.
        参数:
        subject - the subject
        body - the body
        to - the to
        attachments - the attachments
        names - the names
        contents - the contents
        返回:
        true, if successful
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - the Exception
